name: Showers Pass Cross Country Shorts - Women's
description: Made by a crew of passionate cyclists at Showers Pass, these shorts are so comfy that all you’ll think about is the trail ahead. Seated, hammering up a fire road, or in ready-position and flowing through berms, they stay exactly where they should, no bunching, no binding.Nylon and spandex blend balances durability with stretch.Brushed lining wicks moisture and glides over liner shorts.Rear panel improves breathability.Adjustable tabs at the waist.Silicone grip at waist.2 snap and hook and bar, for a secure closure.Body mapped construction lets the shorts move with you.Reflective details.2 hand pockets and 2 rear pockets provide storage.Pockets are mesh lined for ventilation.As of 2020 Showers Pass is Climate Neutral certified, meaning they fully offset their carbon emissions. Climate Neutral certified is a consumer label that's carried by brands who take responsibility for greenhouse gas emissions generated in production, operation and shipping of  their goods and services.
